Name: SNOMEDCTBodyStructures
Title: SNOMED CT Body Structures
Descriptino: This value set includes all codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 442083009 (Anatomical or acquired body site (body structure)).

Name: Condition/Problem/DiagnosisCodes
Title: Condition/Problem/Diagnosis Codes
Descriptino: Example value set for Condition/Problem/Diagnosis codes.

Name: Condition/DiagnosisSeverity
Title: Condition/Diagnosis Severity
Descriptino: Preferred value set for Condition/Diagnosis severity grading.

Name: ConditionStage
Title: Condition Stage
Descriptino: Example value set for stages of cancer and other conditions.

Name: ConditionStageType
Title: Condition Stage Type
Descriptino: Example value set for the type of stages of cancer and other conditions

Name: DataAbsentReason
Title: DataAbsentReason
Descriptino: Used to specify why the normally expected content of the data element is missing.

Name: EncounterReasonCodes
Title: Encounter Reason Codes
Descriptino: This examples value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate reasons for an encounter.

Name: EncounterStatus
Title: EncounterStatus
Descriptino: Current state of the encounter.

Name: ManifestationAndSymptomCodes
Title: Manifestation and Symptom Codes
Descriptino: Example value set for Manifestation and Symptom codes.

Name: ObservationMethods
Title: Observation Methods
Descriptino: Observation Method codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 272394005 (Technique (qualifier value)) or is-a 129264002 (Action (qualifier value)) or is-a 386053000 (Evaluation procedure(procedure))

Name: ObservationStatus
Title: ObservationStatus
Descriptino: Codes providing the status of an observation.

Name: VitalSigns
Title: Vital Signs
Descriptino: This value set indicates the allowed vital sign result types.   The LOINC code for Vitals Signs panel (85353-1) is a grouping structure for a set of vital signs and includes related links (with type=has-member) to the Observations in this set (e.g. respiratory rate, heart rate, BP).  The Blood pressure panel (85354-9) is used to group the component observations Systolic blood pressure (8480-6) and Diastolic blood pressure (8462-4).

Name: ObservationReferenceRangeAppliesToCodes
Title: Observation Reference Range Applies To Codes
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the particular target population the reference range applies to.

Name: ServiceType
Title: Service type
Descriptino: This value set defines an example set of codes of service-types.

Name: ConditionCategoryCodes
Title: Condition Category Codes
Descriptino: Preferred value set for Condition Categories.

Name: ConditionClinicalStatusCodes
Title: Condition Clinical Status Codes
Descriptino: Preferred value set for Condition Clinical Status.

Name: ConditionVerificationStatus
Title: ConditionVerificationStatus
Descriptino: The verification status to support or decline the clinical status of the condition or diagnosis.

Name: DiagnosisRole
Title: DiagnosisRole
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to express the role of a diagnosis on the Encounter or EpisodeOfCare record.

Name: AdmitSource
Title: Admit source
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate from where the patient came in.

Name: EncounterClass
Title: Encounter class
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the class of encounter: a specific code indicating class of service provided.

Name: EncounterType
Title: Encounter type
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the type of encounter: a specific code indicating type of service provided.

Name: ObservationReferenceRangeMeaningCodes
Title: Observation Reference Range Meaning Codes
Descriptino: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the meaning/use of a reference range for a particular target population.

Name: Hl7VSReAdmissionIndicator
Title: hl7VS-re-admissionIndicator
Descriptino: Value Set of codes which are used to specify that a patient is being re-admitted to a healthcare facility from which they were discharged, and indicates the circumstances around such re-admission.

Name: ActPriority
Title: ActPriority
Descriptino: A code or set of codes (e.g., for routine, emergency,) specifying the urgency under which the Act happened, can happen, is happening, is intended to happen, or is requested/demanded to happen.    *Discussion:* This attribute is used in orders to indicate the ordered priority, and in event documentation it indicates the actual priority used to perform the act. In definition mood it indicates the available priorities.

Name: ObservationCategory
Title: ObservationCategory
Descriptino: High level observation categories for the general type of observation being made.    *Steward:* OO WG

Name: ParticipationType
Title: ParticipationType
Descriptino: A code specifying the meaning and purpose of every Participation instance. Each of its values implies specific constraints on the Roles undertaking the participation.

Name: EncounterLocationServiceClassExtension
Title: Encounter Location Extension
Descriptino: A set of codes, specifying location extension valueset.

Name: ObservationBodySite
Title: Value set specific for Observation BodySite
Descriptino: Value set specific for Observation BodySite

Name: Observationcode
Title: Value set specific for Observation Code
Descriptino: Value set specific for Observation Code

Name: Observation.interpretation
Title: Value set specific for Observation Code
Descriptino: Value set specific for Observation Code

Name: Observation.valueCodeableConcept
Title: Value set specific for Observation value CodeableConcept
Descriptino: Value set specific for Observation value CodeableConcept

Name: Observation.valueCodeableConceptSpecific
Title: Value set specific for Observation specific value CodeableConcept
Descriptino: Value set specific for Observation specific value CodeableConcept

Name: EncounterLocationServiceClassInpatient
Title: Encounter Location ServiceClass-Inpatient
Descriptino: A set of codes, specifying location ServiceClass for inpatient patient.

Name: EncounterLocationServiceClassOutpatient
Title: Encounter Location ServiceClass-Outpatient
Descriptino: A set of codes, specifying location ServiceClass for outpatient patient.

Name: EncounterLocationUpgradeClass
Title: Encounter Location Upgrade Class
Descriptino: A set of codes, specifying location UpgradeClass.
